page.title: 14Whitwell Library
page.content: Following a visit to the library these are some of the things we discovered.There was 6,000 books in the library.The most popular books are fiction,in particular;romances, westerns,thrillers,Cathreen Cookson,cookery and gardening.429 children have joined and 741 adults.3,500 to 4,000 books are borrowed each month. The busiest day is Friday. There are large print books for people who cannot see very well and there are also house-bound services. They have talking books for blind people and there are weekly visits from the playgroup. The school children as well as borrowing books, use the reference section. The library is situated in the Civic Centre.
